preference.name: CATIA_load_all_product_shapeRep
preference.preference_description: Load all linked datasets to a product itemrevision or not Possible values : TRUE - loaded FALSE - notloaded AUTO - If CATProduct dataset exist under item revision (with or without file) - not loaded If dataset doesn't exist - loaded
